Reviews.Title: Samsung Series 7 NP700Z3A-S03US Review
Reviews.Author: Antonio "Antonio Brown"
Reviews.Content: I must say this is a very Interesting Laptop. It's light weight, thin and compact. I got mine for a Steel of only $400 at a local shop.I do Have Pros, Cons and Experience Index.Pros:Thin and Attractive Aluminum Body Shell,Web Cam,2nd Generation Intel i5 ProcessorBack-lit Keyboard,20 Second Boot Time,Slot DVD Burner Drive,Radeon HD Graphics,Instead of Window's Pathetic HD Graphics,5 Hour Battery Life,750 GB Hard Drive Split into Two Disk Dries, andFinally No Glossy Screen____________________________________________________Cons:Touch Pad!! Very Sensitive, No Split Left or Right Buttons, (Built into Touch Pad). Recommendation Small Wireless Mouse.At Times on the lap may heat up.____________________________________________________Windows Experience Index:Graphics:  5.9Processor:  6.9Memory (8GBRAM):  7.4Gaming Graphics:  6.3Primary Hard Disk:  5.9____________________________________________________Final Thoughts:Expensive Laptop Depending on Budget but I Recommend this Laptop. It Compares to Macbooks 14 Inch i5 Processor Laptops.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price.
Reviews.Author: MC
Reviews.Content: Got mine from amazon wearhouse. Nicely priced.It comes with 2 licenses for windows 7. The original one and a refurbished one. So you technically get 2 windowses with it.Laptop was brand new, no blemishes.Amazon took the time to reformat the hard drive and didn't bother to install the crapware that these usually come with.Thus windows was pristine.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a student
Reviews.Author: Jessica Robicheaux
Reviews.Content: It's not as light-weight as I expected it to be, but it's as fast as advertised and very comfortable to use. Runs all of my Adobe Cloud programs and launches them in seconds - compared to 2-3 minutes on my old laptop! Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: a good enough laptop
Reviews.Author: Faleatua Faleatua "Fale"
Reviews.Content: The laptop feel solid and looks expensive. It's fairly fast, but I'm far from being a computer expert. But for my needs it's more than enough. Only flaw is a full charged battery will only give 4 hours of online time, oh and it's a little heavier then my 14in Dell.

Reviews.Title: nice laptop
Reviews.Author: Ryan C. Morris
Reviews.Content: i got this laptop refurbished from secondipity for a great price.  this is a really solid laptop - backlit keyboard, windows 7 - basically everything i wanted in a laptop for school/work.  it is fast enough for my needs - only thing that drives me nuts is the touchpad for the mouse.. but i purchased a wireless mouse which should bypass that problem.  other than that- it's a great laptop!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung convert!
Reviews.Author: DTS
Reviews.Content: This machine was more than adequate for my needs.  Fast boot, back-lit keyboard and reliability are just a few of the things I love about the computer.
